entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -29.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -29.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -33.4°C
Wind: SSW 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:49 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
